name: Internet Exposure
tagline: A Minneapolis Web Design & Development Agency
description: Internet Exposure is a digital agency based in the Twin Cities. We specialize in interactive website design, development, online marketing, ecommerce and technical support. We've been creating long term online strategies since 1995 - strategies that completely transform our clients' businesses. We serve clients in various industries. Our expertise lies in web design, web development, custom applications, search marketing, content strategy/copywriting, ecommerce, and inbound marketing.
